mapper.select: SELECT a.LOG_ID , a.CREAT_DT , a.CONECT_MTHD , a.CONECT_IP , a.CONECT_ID , b.USER_NM AS LOGIN_NM FROM LETTNLOGINLOG a LEFT OUTER JOIN COMVNUSERMASTER b ON a.CONECT_ID = b.ESNTL_ID WHERE a.LOG_ID = #{logId}

SELECT a.LOG_ID , a.CREAT_DT , a.CONECT_MTHD , a.CONECT_IP , a.CONECT_ID , b.USER_NM AS LOGIN_NM , a.PC_INFO , a.BROWSER_INFO FROM LETTNLOGINLOG a LEFT OUTER JOIN COMVNUSERMASTER b ON a.CONECT_ID = b.USER_ID WHERE 1 = 1
AND a.CONECT_ID LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchWrd}, '%')
AND b.USER_NM LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchWrd}, '%')
AND a.PC_INFO LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchWrd}, '%')
AND a.BROWSER_INFO LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchWrd}, '%')
AND a.CREAT_DT BETWEEN STR_TO_DATE(CONCAT(#{searchBgnDe},' 00:00:00'), '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AND STR_TO_DATE(CONCAT(#{searchEndDe},' 23:59:59'), '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s')
ORDER BY a.CREAT_DT DESC LIMIT #{recordCountPerPage} OFFSET #{firstIndex}

SELECT COUNT(a.LOG_ID) as cnt FROM LETTNLOGINLOG a LEFT OUTER JOIN COMVNUSERMASTER b ON a.CONECT_ID = b.ESNTL_ID WHERE 1 = 1
AND a.CONECT_ID LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchWrd}, '%')
AND b.USER_NM LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchWrd}, '%')
AND a.PC_INFO LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchWrd}, '%')
AND a.BROWSER_INFO LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchWrd}, '%')
AND a.CREAT_DT BETWEEN STR_TO_DATE(CONCAT(#{searchBgnDe},' 00:00:00'), '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AND STR_TO_DATE(CONCAT(#{searchEndDe},' 23:59:59'), '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s')
